name: Drained (VamptVo)
description:
Try to keep your phone alive and retain your sanity while completing tasks in this frantic microgame collection! Created for Ludum Dare 50.

Playable on mobile or desktop web, but mobile is recommended.

Created by:

  • Derwin (art, writing, sound, design)
  • Evan Minto (code, design, writing)
